name: The Gilded Lotus
description: An upscale establishment contrasting sharply with the rustic village outside. Thick carpets muffle footsteps, and the air smells of expensive perfume and cigar smoke.

lobby.name: Casino Lobby
lobby.description: The entrance to the casino is grand, with a crystal chandelier hanging from the ceiling. Soft music plays from somewhere unseen. A receptionist stands behind a polished mahogany desk, and a sweeping staircase leads to the upper floor.

dice_parlor.name: Dice Parlor
dice_parlor.description: A dimly lit room focused around a large, green-felted table. The rhythmic clatter of dice is the only sound. A dealer waits expectantly behind the table.

slots_room.name: The Gearworks
slots_room.description: This room is filled with the whirring and clicking of clockwork machinery. Several brass slot machines line the walls, tended to by a mechanical servant.

upper_lobby.name: Upper Balcony
upper_lobby.description: A plush, carpeted balcony overlooking the main lobby. Waiters drift silently carrying trays of drinks. Private gaming rooms branch off to the east, west, and north.

wheel_room.name: Hall of Elements
wheel_room.description: This circular room is dominated by a massive, vertical spinning wheel. Sections of the wheel glow with magical light representing the elements. The air hums with energy.

card_room.name: High Stakes Parlor
card_room.description: An intimate room with velvet-draped walls and a single, pristine card table. The atmosphere is tense and quiet.

arcane_vault.name: The Arcane Vault
arcane_vault.description: A high-security room guarded by magical wards. In the center stands a massive, locked Vault Door with three glowing tumblers. A solemn keeper watches over it.
